name: Hampton Bay Belleville Patio Dining Chairs - 2 Pack
description: Create the perfect outdoor space by combining the Hampton Bay Belleville Patio Dining Chairs with your existing table or use them as stand-alone pieces for conversation areas. They were designed to complement all items in the Belleville Collection. These beautiful brown C-spring sling chairs feature a rust-resistant finish for durability.Rust-resistant steel frame with weather-resistant finish for lasting durabilityMulti-step frame finish in antique bronze offers an elegant styleComfortable C-spring motion chairs with UV protected sling fabricEasy to clean with a damp clothAll hardware included for simple assembly2-year limited manufacturer warranty on both the frame and fabricCoordinates with other patio furniture and accessories in the Belleville collection (sold separately)Includes two dining chairs
